tagline: Based off the game from Fantasy Flight Games
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Dust-tactics
body: ### Description My evolving implementation of the game "Dust Tactics" created by Fantasy Flight Games [http://fantasyflightgames.com] I am in no way affiliated with Fantasy Flight Games, but if this program seems interesting, I encourage you to buy the actual game! ### Requirements Ruby >= 1.9.3 ### Status Version 1.0 is in development. Currently, The game can not be played from a central UI and a few remaining components must be designed and implemented. ### Build Status:
